verses.verse: How <S%H834><s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5087>vowed<s%> unto the <S%H46>mighty<s%> God of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%>
Surely <S%H518><s%> I will not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of my <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H518>nor<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> my <S%H6210>bed;<s%> <S%H3326><s%>
I will <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H8153>sleep<s%> to mine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> or <S%H8572>slumber<s%> to mine <S%H6079>eyelids,<s%>
Until <S%H5704><s%> I find <S%H4672>out<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> a <S%H4908>habitation<s%> for the <S%H46>mighty<s%> God of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
Lo, <S%H2009><s%> we <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it at <S%H672>Ephratah:<s%> we <S%H4672>found<s%> it in the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H3293>wood.<s%>
We will <S%H935>go<s%> into his <S%H4908>tabernacles:<s%> we will <S%H7812>worship<s%> at his <S%H1916>footstool.<s%> <S%H7272><s%>
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> into thy <S%H4496>rest;<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of thy <S%H5797>strength.<s%>
Let thy <S%H3548>priests<s%> be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> and let thy <S%H2623>saints<s%> shout for <S%H7442>joy.<s%>
For thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H5668>sake<s%> turn not <S%H7725>away<s%> <S%H408><s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of thine <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> unto <S%H1732>David;<s%> he will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> it; Of the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H6529><s%> of thy <S%H990>body<s%> will I <S%H7896>set<s%> upon thy <S%H3678>throne.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> thy <S%H1121>children<s%> will <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and my <S%H5713>testimony<s%> <S%H2097>that<s%> I shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> them, their <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon thy <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H5704>forevermore.<s%> <S%H5703><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> he hath <S%H183>desired<s%> it for his <S%H4186>habitation.<s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> is my <S%H4496>rest<s%> <S%H5704>forever:<s%> <S%H5703><s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> will I <S%H3427>dwell;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H183>desired<s%> it.
I will abundantly <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H1288><s%> her <S%H6718>provision:<s%> I will <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> her <S%H34>poor<s%> with <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
I will also <S%H3847>clothe<s%> her <S%H3548>priests<s%> with <S%H3468>salvation:<s%> and her <S%H2623>saints<s%> shall shout aloud for <S%H7442>joy.<s%> <S%H7442><s%>
There <S%H8033><s%> will I make the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H6779>bud:<s%> I have <S%H6186>ordained<s%> a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> for mine <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>
His <S%H341>enemies<s%> will I <S%H3847>clothe<s%> with <S%H1322>shame:<s%> but <S%H5921>upon<s%> himself shall his <S%H5145>crown<s%> <S%H6692>flourish.<s%>
